website_summaries.verdict: A cute and affordable quad with impressive battery life. The best option for budget conscious buyers.
pros: Thoughtfully designed for toddlers with push-button operation and a low body that's easy for little legs to get on and off of
Wide tires allow it to ride on grass
Cute compartment in the front for tiny take-alongs
A sure hit with Paw Patrol fans
cons: Although push-button acceleration is easy to operate, little fingers may tire

customer_reviews.title: We got this for my son for his 2nd birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son for his 2nd birthday. We were looking at another quad but were concerned that it would be too big for him to use right away. For what it is, I'm impressed. He can ride it around our yard with no issue and the push button on the handle ensures that he doesn't "go" accidentally. My only word of caution to other parents is that it is on the small side. My son is in the 20th percentile for height and weight and he has very little (if any) room to grow on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: The little quad was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: The little quad was easy to put together. Unfortunately the right front tire will not spin. On careful inspection the plastic attaching the tire to the axle mechanism was cut unevenly and causes friction not allowing the tire to spin like the opposite tire which interferes severely with the steering mechanism. The only solution is to remove the tire and axle attachments or hack saw the plastic to the proper level. I have been working on it for 2 hours so far. Fisher Price has a web site for troubleshooting, but there is no related topic. All the quality control people had to do was spin the front tires before placing in the box to catch this problem...
customer_reviews.author: john buckley

customer_reviews.title: Must have for indoors or outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: Super popular toy used daily and going strong. Recharges fast and runs a very long time with plenty of power in a very simple format. Few parts means less to break , assembly took literally under 1 min. Kids love love love this. I would advise you find a good padding for the button on handlebar which is used to activate it, the button is square with corners and makes the little ones thumb sore after a bit. Moleskin works!
customer_reviews.author: AMGbaby

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My son has tried in every way to wreck this litte bike....but he still has it in one peice almost 2 years now. Totally a good buy. It is not fast , which made it safe for my son who was 1+ when he got it. It is really a durable buy....the battery gave way after a year, but that wasnt an issue for me. My son still has it and pushes around. I reccomend without a douth. My son is 3 and he stills sit on it and uses his leg to push it around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 yr-old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for Christmas for my 3 year-old godson (who is very small) and he loves it. It is very slow and requires a large turning radius but I'm not the one riding it lol! None of that matters to him. All he knows is it's fun to ride and that's fine with me. He was very excited when he saw the Batman stickers but the icing on the cake was a personal name plate on the back. The look on his little chubby-cheeked face and the huge hug was priceless!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Approved
customer_reviews.text: My year old grandson loves this toy! I was a bit apprehensive about buying this for him because I didn't know if he could drive it but he fits perfectly on it and amazingly he cruises on the thing!
customer_reviews.author: AmyKerz

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Upset 3 year old!  Returning 20 min of getting delivered!
customer_reviews.text: Very upset my son waited a week for this car and upon unpacking we automatically saw that the right wheel was completely bent in making it unable to move. The disappointment on my sons face when I told him he couldn’t ride his car he waited so long to get was heart breaking.
customer_reviews.author: TheMKFamily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 1st Birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: So far my son loves it! We just got it for his first birthday. We wanted to make sure that he liked it so we opened it early (birthday is 1.5 weeks away) and he likes it. He can’t even walk yet and he’s riding it like a champ! Only issue is he can’t really turn it so he keeps crashing, but he’ll get there... Slow enough to not scare him but fast enough to excite him. I think he’s going to get a lot of use out of it... very happy with the purchase! Able to get off by himself
customer_reviews.author: TheHowards

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son for his 2nd birthday and he loves it! It's just the right size for him (he's 34 in tall and weighs 23 lbs) and the charge lasts for so long! He really got the hang of this right away and isn't too fast where I feel it's a little dangerous like the bigger versions of these cars. While this works great for my son some of the heavier neighbor kids use this and it doesn't go as fast as it does for my son but still works! My son also has no problems with it working in the grass
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Our 3 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my sons third birthday. He loves it... Although it is pretty small for him and he likely won't fit on it by next summer. He weighs roughly 33 pounds and it still moves nicely. He rides it in our yard which probably slows him down a little. Its adorable for a Paw Patrol loving kiddo and our son we THRILLED to get his very own four wheeler. I would think that it would be an ideal size for a two year old.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime and Chad

customer_reviews.title: Power Wheels have come a long way...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I bought it months ago and my daughter rides it around the house a few times a week and I haven't yet had to charge the battery! I had a Power Wheels Jeep back in the day and I was lucky to get a half hour out of a fully charged battery! Putting the stickers on myself was kind of a pain because I am not good at that and they are all crooked but my kid doesn't seem to notice or care!
customer_reviews.author: Bunker1000

customer_reviews.title: Put your walking shoes on!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 18 months old, it is perfect size for him. Assembly was easy, it is slow so that is good for a young child. Battery life lasts a long time. Does good on grass, pavement, gravel, and we let him ride it inside on the tile and hardwood floor a few times. My only dislike is that the area for his feet could be a bit bigger. Overall a great purchase. The smile on my son's face is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I would like this more if the wheels were able to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I would like this more if the wheels were able to be used inside or on uneven services. My son cannot use this in our house because of our hardwood floors it does not move. He cannot use it outside in the grass because it is not a completely flat surface. The wheels are hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very Small not the normal 6v size.
customer_reviews.text: This says it is for 1-3 yr old kids, but I bought it for my 2 yr old grandson's birthday and he couldn't even fit his feet in the foot holder. Only problem is I ordered it to early and now can't return. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Janell Dugger

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last for very long.
customer_reviews.text: After a month the rear right wheel striped and now it does not work. But when it was working it was great. Now I will use it for parts and toss the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my grandson who is a year old. Cute as can be. It came in pieces, but was very simple to put together. The instructions were very easy to read and understand. The decals were all on a page and were very simple to place. The charging unit is easy to locate and is secure from little fingers. Charges pretty fast. The handle bars were spaced just far enough for grandson to reach and the buttons were so easy, he understood the first time. He loves it and rides all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Sains

customer_reviews.title: How to fix the traction problem on hard floors
customer_reviews.text: It works well. It is about what i would expect for $65, kinda small and slow but thats what i was looking for. People complain about it not having traction on hard floors, which is true. The easy fix to this is put a couple rubber bands around the tires. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Cletus Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great little ride
customer_reviews.text: My son love this little four wheeler bought for him 1st birthday and hes about to turn two and he is still riding it the life it great DC ont have to charge to often
customer_reviews.author: Tasha S.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was fairly easy to assemble. Three year old LOVES it. He drives all over our house with it. His older brother also enjoys it. If you do not like the stickers, you don’t have to add them.
customer_reviews.author: A2

customer_reviews.title: Cute car!
customer_reviews.text: While my son loves riding his mini quad, I found it to be a little awkward. The quad only drives in forward gear and no backwards. He just tends to run into things and then I have to pull it back and redirect the car. I'm still happy with my purchase because my son's happy when he's on it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers 12 m and up
customer_reviews.text: My one yearold loves this its awesome and easy to use it only goes forward no reverse but its ok he loves it and the button is on the handle wich is perfect cus once he learned how easy it is he cant stop using it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 21 month old boy loves this thing
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. It drives like a tractor and is super slow which is perfect for our little guy. There's almost no way he can hurt himself. My only complaint is that the charger doesn't have a regulator so if you forget to unplug it, you can toast the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew and he loves it. A little difficult to build specially since the instructions provided weren’t for building this toy.
customer_reviews.author: lili1214

customer_reviews.title: Dead Slow
customer_reviews.text: This thing is too slow to recommend. I was hoping we could take it out on walks bit that is a no go. And why doesn't it have reverse? Thateans it is useless inside of a house.
customer_reviews.author: JoPGo

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to read instructions
customer_reviews.text: Took longer to assemble but still was pretty easy my son loves it and the battery life is pretty good. Looks pretty strong and can take a fall down a flight of stairs and still work fine
customer_reviews.author: La.Yeyerz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. Works great and a good speed for toddler. The only problem is his feet dont fit in the space made where the feet should go, Hes 2 years old..other than that he loves it and so do we.
customer_reviews.author: DNB SOTO

customer_reviews.title: Get this if ur unsure. It's easy for 1 years olds
customer_reviews.text: He is 14 months old and loves this. He rides In the house , outside and anywhere. I'm really happy I got this. I wasnt sure cuz he was 1. But he steers and all.
customer_reviews.author: TanayaH

customer_reviews.title: Kid Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old. Loves it!! He is about 3 feet tall. Perfect size for him. Holds a long charge. It’s not fast at all. About walking speed. Which I like for his age. Works great on concrete. Little slower on grass. Haven’t found any negatives yet. Highly recommend. Your little one will love it.
customer_reviews.author: John Noyola

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasts for days.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is just shy of 30 pounds and it still carries him without trouble. Take it to Dumont dunes and let him ride around camp it handles just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Keiser

customer_reviews.title: Choose a different brand/maker!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say... this is not the best for kids. The engine is very loud, the steering is hard to turn and moves very slow. I also tried to wash of some mud on the car, now all of the designs on the exterior are coming off! Not happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Mya Alazzeh

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it in the house and it was a breeze ...
customer_reviews.text: Indoor or hard surface only!!! My kids love it in the house and it was a breeze to put together. I bought my daughter a barbie 12 volt power wheel and it took a lot more to assemble a few hours. This you just put the wheels and handle bars on and your good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lozada

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't like its the fact that it doesn't go back. Other than that is perfect and my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than should be.
customer_reviews.text: It says ages 12-36 months. But the spots for a kid to put their feet are to small for my 23 month old. And he’s on the smaller end of his age group. Would recommend taking your kid to toysrus to see if they fit it first.
customer_reviews.author: Tims944

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephews 2 year birthday and it’s been his favorite toy for many months now. He rides this thing around the house for hours every day. A litte loud but worth seeing the smile on his face.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Djourabchi

customer_reviews.title: Great for all paw patrol lovers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for a 2 to 3 ur old. Runs great 6v but after 3 you'll nned something faster. 12vol or 24volt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: He absolutely loves it. Great gift and surprisingly it has a lot of power. I highly recommend this item for the paw patrol lover in the family.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Knowles

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: i love this toy, my son was about 8 mons when i bought, he has yet to ride off in the sunset, be i know he will 1 day soon he's now 19mon in a few days. So he getting better at looking forward while going forward lol
customer_reviews.author: MzMeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Toddler refuses to ride it.
customer_reviews.text: My toddler won’t use it. Not sure why there are so many rave reviews. My 18 month old just has no interest in this toy.
customer_reviews.author: CiCi

customer_reviews.title: He loves it & the battery is still in excellent condition. I'd give it more than 5 stars ...
customer_reviews.text: My son will be 4 in November & he's still riding this thing!! We have upgraded him to a Yamaha with actual rubber tires but we've gotten way more than our money's worth from this thing. He loves it & the battery is still in excellent condition. I'd give it more than 5 stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: kenzie B

customer_reviews.title: He was pretty good at driving it back then but now that ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son when he was 12 months old. He was pretty good at driving it back then but now that he's 1.5 years old he loves it even more. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: nicole eger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect “1st Car!”
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson’s 1st birthday! He doesn’t quite know how to operate it just yet but he’s almost got it!! Pure joy on his face when he does push the button and it moves forward!!! I’d buy it again in a heartbeat!!
customer_reviews.author: C.E.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great grandson. He was so happy, we couldn't pry him off of it. It's exceptionally sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is great. Used it a few times a week for ...
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves it! Simple to use. 16 months and he gets it. Battery life is great. Used it a few times a week for a month and have not needed to recharge battery yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, much smaller than I thought. It flips over backwards very easily, my son has flipped several time, thankfully did not get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Larios

customer_reviews.title: Issue with seat
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to be perfect. My kiddo loves it but its a pain because the seat often comes off and then my 2 year old has access to the battery which is unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Wykowski

customer_reviews.title: Fun stickers, colorful and safe
customer_reviews.text: small battery power, so moves slowly. Plastic wheels aren't made for street or rocks. Feet holes too small for larger child. Fun stickers, colorful and safe. toddler loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves riding!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was unsure of this purchase. We bought this when our son was 11 months and not yet walking. We saved it for his birthday party, and opened it when he began walking at 13 months. We helped him ride it in the beginning, however now he climbs on on his own, and loves driving it. He has yet to figure out he controls the steering!
customer_reviews.author: catskinner29

customer_reviews.title: ... Power Wheels for our 15 month old after she liked on at a friend's house
customer_reviews.text: We purchases this Power Wheels for our 15 month old after she liked on at a friend's house. Chose the Batman because, 1) Mommy loves Batman and 2) the price was right. It is so fun to watch her riding on it!! Right now, she's not heavy enough to make it go outside. But she does ride it inside and it works on our area rug and the wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Hairscapades

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: grand son loves it and a smile on a child's face is the greatest thing .
customer_reviews.author: 2002 vulcon

customer_reviews.title: great time to introduce to wearing helmet
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for Grandson who is 20 months, loves it! Bought Giro helmet for him when riding, great time to introduce to wearing helmet.
customer_reviews.author: vicky

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: One year old loves this! Got it at a super good price! No complaints! Husband added more traction to the tires so our son can go more places
customer_reviews.author: KelleyS

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this power wheels for my 2yo son. It is easy to assemble. I charged the battery over night and used it the next day. My son loves it. My son is still learning how to ride it as it does jerk a bit. I have to watch him closely. It goes 2mph.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Completely missing the handlebar!
customer_reviews.text: Received item my child was so excited And then we realized it was missing the handlebar😥 Trying to explain to a 21 month old why he could not ride on his new bike made for a long day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ride on for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great for small children, my son is 2 turning 3 in 4 months. He loves it. I wish the run time was faster. The charging takes all night for a full run time. Make sure to charge it to the for the proper amount if time for the first charging. It was priced great when I got it for 67$, MSRP is 100$.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Subudhi

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great! My son loves Batman so we bought this for him for his birthday and he loves riding around in it. My older daughter also likes to ride in it when she can. Very fun!
customer_reviews.author: A. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 2 yr old grandson and he looked it, took him about a day to get the hang of pushing button to go.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Scarberry

customer_reviews.title: It just keeps going and going...
customer_reviews.text: The charge on this thing is AMAZING! I have a 40 lb 2 year old and it just goes for days without a charge. He is obsessed with Batman and drives this thing all over the house. This has been one of the best things I have bought him. Literally nothing bad to say about it!
customer_reviews.author: Raina Paul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for 2yr old grandson
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in July for my grandson’s 2nd birthday. He is loving it! It came with good instructions and was easy to assemble. He is still running it on the initial battery charge. It handles great on the blacktop and in the grass, at a nice slow speed. He drives it to the playground, plays, then drives it home. He is a smaller 2 yr old, so the fit is perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Pjh

customer_reviews.title: Santa's Gift to My 1 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: We have a Power Wheels Lil Kawasaki for my daughter and were going to just hand it down... that didn't go over very well so Santa bought my son a brand new Power Wheels. He loves this and now they "race" alongside each other (even though they go the same speed. Lol)
customer_reviews.author: Anie D.

customer_reviews.title: its a great 1st power
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it... He was just over 1 at Christmas and other then it needs a reverse button, its a great 1st power toy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you don't want you kids disappoint when his birthday
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want you kids disappoint when his birthday, assemble that toy before. At least you got time to check it if there were lots of part missing or not,and you could have time buy anther one!!!
customer_reviews.author: CUI

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves playing with this! Quality is good for the price and battery life is long. It is not already assembled so make sure to open the box and assemble before giving if your child will want to play right away. Had some difficulty getting it together, but once you get the first part done it goes quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Of course it is cheap plastic but thats what you expect for the price. Just annoying as heck when you are to use 2 screws on putting it together and they do not include them. I had some that work but still. You cant include 2 cents worth of screws?
customer_reviews.author: john mccann

customer_reviews.title: Best present ever he said
customer_reviews.text: Yes he loves it and won't leave it alone. Best present ever he said. Thanks again amazon
customer_reviews.author: edwin mcintire

customer_reviews.title: but it works great.
customer_reviews.text: my 2.7 years grandson loves it, but it is a little small for him, he crams his feet in. but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Titch72

customer_reviews.title: Great size, but loud
customer_reviews.text: It's a great size for an apartment. Kids of all ages seem to love it. The batteries last for days. Only downside is that it's really, very loud. The older version someone else I know has, also has storage space in the back and a cup holder. I wish they hadn't done away with that.
customer_reviews.author: SNAP

customer_reviews.title: Paw Patrol Lover!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old got this for Christmas. He can't quite press the button just yet but big sister helps. He loves this thing & rides in the house since we have snow in CT. No problems on the carpet & the battery has lasted quite awhile now. It does take long to charge though like any Power Wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki R

customer_reviews.title: My 18 month old son loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old loves it! Even his 6 and 12 year old cousins love it lol. I took one star off because I wish there were a reverse button. Otherwise it is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: My boy absolutely loves this power wheel. My only complaint is that the battery drains relatively quickly. It was pretty simple to put together.
customer_reviews.author: BoltMan

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 3 and she loves this. It’s not too small for her so if your worried, I’d go for it. She rides this all around nanas. Battery lasts a long time as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kensington Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use great for one year olds
customer_reviews.text: My son is one year old at first he was afraid after a week he's riding it on his own
customer_reviews.author: Porfirio Heredia

customer_reviews.title: Great value for first electronic car/motorcycle !
customer_reviews.text: Great first vehicle to leave how to steer. It goes slow but fast enough for my son to feel cool! He is 20 months and was a little scared but overall has lotsa of fun. I do recommend this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift flop
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this 4 wheeler is terrible. After assembling it, putting on all the stickers and charging it for the required 18 hours, we discovered the axle was broken. Our two year old is so disappointed in our Christmas gift flop.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Hafer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little one
customer_reviews.text: My son just turned one and he was excited to use this. It goes just slow enough for him and fits him great. But always remember to supervise your kids when they use stuff like this!
customer_reviews.author: Skexys

customer_reviews.title: have to say it had excellent potential but was extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: have to say it had excellent potential but was extremely disappointed.... package was missing the front compartment cover and some of the construction connections were weak
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for his second birthday. It was easy for him to figure out. We’ve had it since June 2018 and it’s still in great condition. He drives it around the house daily.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons love it.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and my grandsons love it which is all I really care about.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 1yr old
customer_reviews.text: It took him a few weeks to figure out how to push the button but once he did he was all over the kitchen on his “bat mobile”
customer_reviews.author: S&DMama

customer_reviews.title: Good for my Toddler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2yr old son. It was very easy to put together and is the perfect size for him. You have to charge it after every ride to keep the battery in best condition. I wouldn't recommend this for a child too much older or heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together! Took five minutes. My grandson loves it perfect for a two-year-old
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together! Took five minutes. My grandson loves it perfect for a two-year-old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is very cute
customer_reviews.text: It is very cute, my son likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: salen

customer_reviews.title: Cute car
customer_reviews.text: My son loved his new car. Only flaw we had was my son is tall for a 2 year old and his feet barely fit on the sides so he has to ride with his feet up. My son loves the little compartment in the front to put his little toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My one year old loves this! He can't hold ...
customer_reviews.text: My one year old loves this! He can't hold the button yet, so we use a rubber band to keep it on, while supervising him.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R

customer_reviews.title: ... old niece for Christmas since Paw Patrols is her favorite! She LOVED it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2 and a half year old niece for Christmas since Paw Patrols is her favorite! She LOVED it! Rode it all around the house on Christmas and now close to three months later, she still rides it everyday. My sister-in-law just sent us a video of her the other day riding down the street on it.
customer_reviews.author: kristin bieberly

customer_reviews.title: The Paw Patrol Power Wheels is very cute and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The Paw Patrol Power Wheels is very cute and easy to use. On the down side, the footrest is so small that my 2 year old son's feet do not fit at all. Also the age recommended is 1-3 years old but I bought this for my son's second birthday and he is already to big for it. My 10 month old girl loves it so at least I didn't waist my money completely.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves it! Assembly is easy, but stickers not too easy to apply
customer_reviews.author: Americunuck

customer_reviews.title: this should be a great starter before the bigger powerwheel line of cars
customer_reviews.text: bought them as a gift for my daughter who is 19 months old. fits her perfectly but she's afraid of the noise it makes when you press the go button. as soon as she overcomes her fears, this should be a great starter before the bigger powerwheel line of cars. Paw Patrol version is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: JoeySmash

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Putting it together was easy and fun. My 2 year loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Randy smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but don't use stickers if in the sun
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I think it's awesome. Sadly the stickers wrinkled within the first week of being in the sun. I wish I didn't put the stickers on.
customer_reviews.author: Maksum

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This has last through two kids and is still in great condition. This was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves This! He is right on the edge of being too big for It, but for now is ok. I wish it had a reverse button, it only goes forward. Overall, very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: My son loves riding this. We got it for his 2nd birthday and he took off. Have yet to charge the battery as he's 2 and has the attention span as such, but other wise a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Average Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My baby boy loves his power wheels, still hasn't figured out how to ride it (10 months old) but loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JRebibo

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Worth it to see the look of disbelief and absolute joy in the Childs face. As if it were impossible for something this awesome to exist. Fairly easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Clarette Frank

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this! He just turned two and rides it all over the place, he particularly loves the hidden compartment in the front of it, and the little spot behind the seat to put his toys.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.text: If I had any wishes, it would be that the button to go were bigger. It can be challenging for a child of only 1 year old to hold down. His thumb gets tired fast.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Seems fast enough for him not to get bored.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a five year old. He loves riding this at a local state park over the moss and dirt and tree roots. He ties up bundles is sticks and drags them to the fire. Seems fast enough for him not to get bored.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn H.

customer_reviews.title: Great powerful little 4 wheeler
customer_reviews.text: This thing has major power! And battery has lasted for a month now without charging. The grip on tires sucks so lots of spinning happening.
customer_reviews.author: kjrogers

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy assembly. Took less than 5 minutes. Purchased for my little one that loves Paw Patrol. We've always bought Peg Perego ride on toys and this is our first experience with Fisher Price. So far we are not let down. Seems to be safe and built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S

customer_reviews.title: GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, the product works, but just not very well. If you are looking for quality, keep scrolling
customer_reviews.author: vancarwash

product_meta.title: Power Wheels Nickelodeon PAW Patrol Lil' Quad
product_meta.description: Style:Paw Patrol Lil' Quad| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe Power Wheels Nickelodeon PAW Patrol Lil' Quad vehicle combines sporty ATV styling with awesome toddler friendly features! It features fun Nickelodeon PAW Patrol colors and graphics, and is designed specifically for toddlers with easy push-button operation and comfortable footrests. 6-volts of battery power provide a fun, but safe 2 mph maximum speed. And it rides low, so it’s easy for little ones to get on and off by themselves. It’s as sturdy as it looks – and just as much fun to drive too!
feature_bullets: Push-button operation for easy stop and go
Built-in footrests for a safe, comfortable ride

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars748 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
